title: Jeremy McConnell flaunts striking tattoos as he strips off to finish daughter's nursery
text:

Jeremy McConnell took to Instagram to reveal he's been hard at work finishing his daughter's nursery.

The former Celebrity Big Brother star is expecting his first child with girlfriend Katie McCreath in the coming weeks.

Jeremy, who is also dad to two-year-old Caben Albi with ex Stephanie Davis, told followers he was 'nesting' as he shared a snap of him putting together furniture.

The Irish model was pictured building a white wooden trunk while dressed in nothing but a tiny pair of yellow shorts.

(Image: Instagram)

"Had to get my massive screwdriver out for this box tonight. Excited to finish up the nursery, not long to go. I think I’m nesting," Jeremy wrote in the caption.

Topless Jeremy's enormous tattoo collection was clear to see as he showed off his heavily inked torso, legs and arms.

Last year he splashed out on a 'body suit' so that his entire body is covered in artwork.

(Image: Instagram)

But after treating himself to more tattoos, a beard transplant and numerous cosmetic procedures over the last few years, Jeremy is now focusing on his growing family.

He announced girlfriend Katie was expecting their first child together in July, claiming he was delighted and overwhelmed by the news.

Since then Jeremy has flooded his Instagram with cosy snaps of the two of them preparing for their new arrival as well as documenting Katie's blossoming bump.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Over the weekend Jeremy and Katie attended the Baby Show together where they bumped into reality star mum Amy Childs.

Jeremy first met solicitor Katie in August 2017 and moved in with her eight months later.

(Image: Instagram)

In July this year Jeremy took to Instagram to reveal Katie was expecting his baby but then deleted the post hours later claiming it had been a prank.

He wrote: "Delighted to say Me and @legalblondieeeee are expecting so overwhelmed."

The two hours later Jeremy wrote: "Sorry guys..... no exciting news today! When boys think they are funny and someone's brother gets hold of their Instagram.

"But we will be having 3 baby foals next year so not far off in our house. So thanks for the kind messages!"

Days later Jeremy cropped up on the site to announce the news again.

He shared a picture of him and girlfriend Katie sitting on a patch of grass next to a pony, with a sign that reads: "My new rider expected Dec '19".
description: The dad is preparing for the imminent arrival of his first child with girlfriend Katie McCreath
